#permission under scoutpad

= Introduction =

On default all people can READ but you must specify for other power; 


== The list of Power ==

  * READ
  * WRITE
  * EXECUTE
  * NOTREAD


= Usage =

{{{
$permission = new Sigma_Acl_Permission();
$permission->hasPermission($user_id,$module_name,$controller_name,$power_to_test);
}}}
